official_title: To authorize the Indian Village housing development, located in Providence, Rhode Island, to provide preference for Native Americans in carrying out activities with Federal assistance amounts.

summary.text: Authorizes the Rhode Island Indian Council, Inc. (and any agents, partners, successors, and assigns) to provide preference for Native Americans in selecting tenants for residence in dwelling units of the Indian Village housing development in Providence, Rhode Island.

titles.title: To authorize the Indian Village housing development, located in Providence, Rhode Island, to provide preference for Native Americans in carrying out activities with Federal assistance amounts.
